body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ryan Cox and the customer's name is Beverly Hayes.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Stellar Support. My name is Jamie, and I'm here to help you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jamie, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alex! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some questions about my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! To help you better, I need to verify your identity. Could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alex! And can you also provide me with the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Alex. I appreciate your assistance!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Alex. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out!
